exceptions.summary:
Thrown when no matching case is found for the type. <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" />
            will be an <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> containing the exceptions thrown by each
            attempted case.

memberSignatures.value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Chr.Avro.Resolution.TypeResolution ResolveType<T>() cil managed

returns.summary: A subclass of <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.TypeResolution" /> that contains information about the type.

overloads.summary: Resolves information for a .NET type, trying each case until a match is found.
